message.content:
<<<api>>>: BufferedReader.readLine()
<<<code>>>: BufferedReader input = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
String[] inputs = input.readLine().split(" ");
int x = Integer.parseInt(inputs[0]);
String y = inputs[1];
System.out.println(x);
<<<explanation>>>: Instead of using StringTokenizer, you can use the split() method of the String class to split the input string into an array of strings based on the space delimiter. Then, you can access the individual elements of the array to assign them to the variables x and y.
